CustomField.inlineHelpText: Will this project have an impact on current business continuity, disaster recovery processes and infrastructure? Implication: Changes in business and IT processes and infrastructure often make established business continuity and disaster recovery plans out of date. Not applying changes to the enterpriseâ€™s recovery plans and infrastructure puts the enterprise at risk in the event of an interruption in the normal business process.
CustomField.label: Impact on current business continuity
